alert.note: Alert for Lower Kuskokwim Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 27 at 3:43AM AKST until February 28 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 6 PM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches with locally higher amounts expected. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Lower Kuskokwim Valley. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 6 PM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility and create snow drifts. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
